news.title: Hawkish Powell Shakes Stocks: What's Ahead?
news.content: Friday's market swoon may seem intimidating on the surface. Nevertheless, several pieces of evidence, including the QQQ chart, sentiment, and seasonality suggest that the downside will be limited.

news.title: Rivian Stock Remained Turbulent Today. Is It an Opportunity to Buy?
news.content: Rivian Automotive ( NASDAQ: RIVN ) shares have been on a roller-coaster ride since the U.S. election on Nov. 5. A dip after Donald Trump's election victory was followed by a sharp surge in the shares on company-specific news.Rivian stock is ending the week on a down note, though, with shares ...

news.title: What's in Store for Big Tech ETFs in Trump 2.0?
news.content: The Trump 2.0 era may boost tech stocks with eased antitrust policies and support for AI, though a trade war with China could negatively impact Apple and Tesla.

news.title: Tesla To Partner With Lyft, Uber? Analyst Has 'Rising Conviction' For Future Partnership - Tesla  ( NASDAQ:TSLA )
news.content: Tesla Inc TSLA analysts Tom Narayan and Brad Erickson highlight the company's potential with FSD and robotaxis and also share thoughts on whether the electric vehicle giant could work with Uber Technologies UBER and Lyft Inc LYFT instead of competing against them.
